Bob reused the same prime in two RSA keys to accelerate encryption. An intercepted message: 74677003691952781915380747705284023379142559843105966021961495960788517431955117282933301765474546274200284861286073083256249218792544816931181352080138762551350619527050922880340441257220916082205626095662660825205266881084813989. Can you decrypt it?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=1030582111612853241528914390903720514761420570775492881242816167155012605916067027572536463271748387814603251840175941014988750233804215137129367813322547465193033773997497190195187885810460418909535473101844599135010174834379337489, e=74472154425329539411597906729679898704644360472523903744333645783303699727057882648342366466829795983183001125395009656632338749151910600819896581652008934850365728762795316951805038110199620445607042421801352089363919701882127157

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{v6n4kaep}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 74677003691952781915380747705284023379142559843105966021961495960788517431955117282933301765474546274200284861286073083256249218792544816931181352080138762551350619527050922880340441257220916082205626095662660825205266881084813989
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1030582111612853241528914390903720514761420570775492881242816167155012605916067027572536463271748387814603251840175941014988750233804215137129367813322547465193033773997497190195187885810460418909535473101844599135010174834379337489, e=74472154425329539411597906729679898704644360472523903744333645783303699727057882648342366466829795983183001125395009656632338749151910600819896581652008934850365728762795316951805038110199620445607042421801352089363919701882127157
extra_info: p=32102680754305445410666795026447888584645912696033756592444836383404953594037219051305547142398443392175928680755817, q=32102680754305445410666795026447888584645912696033756592444836383404953594037219051305547142398443392175928680755817, Ï†(n)=1030582111612853241528914390903720514761420570775492881242816167155012605916067027572536463271748387814603251840175876809627241622913393803539314917545378173367641706484312300522421075903272344471432862007559802248225822977017825856
